mapper.sql: company_analysis_result.company_id, analysis_result, name, company_analysis_result.create_by, company_analysis_result.create_date, company_analysis_result.update_by, company_analysis_result.update_date
mapper.select: select , DATE_FORMAT(exposure_date,'%Y-%m') AS exposureDate from company_analysis_result, company where analysis_result = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND company.company_id = company_analysis_result.company_id ORDER BY exposureDate DESC
select , company.registered_capital, company.registered_capital_type from company_analysis_result, company where company.company_id = company_analysis_result.company_id

SELECT company.`name`, t1.longitude, t1.latitude, t1.analysis_result AS analysisResult, DATE_FORMAT(t1.exposure_date,'%Y-%m') AS exposureDate, static_risk_data.static_risk_index AS staticRiskIndex FROM ( SELECT company_analysis_result.company_id, company_location_information.longitude, company_location_information.latitude, company_analysis_result.analysis_result, company_analysis_result.exposure_date FROM company_analysis_result LEFT JOIN company_location_information ON company_location_information.company_id = company_analysis_result.company_id WHERE company_analysis_result.analysis_result = #{analysisResult} AND company_analysis_result.show_on_map = TRUE ) t1 LEFT JOIN company ON company.company_id = t1.company_id LEFT JOIN static_risk_data ON company.`name` = static_risk_data.company_name WHERE static_risk_data.data_version=#{dateVersion}

select DISTINCT c.company_id,c.`name` ,c.company_type companyType , cas.analysis_result analysisResult from company c LEFT JOIN company_building cb on cb.company_id=c.company_id LEFT JOIN company_analysis_result cas on cas.company_id=c.company_id where cb.company_id=c.company_id and cb.building_id=#{buildingId} and c.company_type not in (7,8)
